description: Single storey infill rear extension (following demolition of existing rear conservatory); replacement of existing uPVC windows with double-glazed timber casement windows; restoration works to front facade
decision_conditions: The development to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: To comply with Section 91 of the Town & Country Planning Act 1990

| The development hereby approved shall be retained in accordance with drawing title number(s): Design & Access Statement, PL-09 ER -01, PL-09 ER -02, PL-50 ER -03 Rev A (Received 26/06/2019), PL-09 ER -04 Rev B (Received 26/06/2019), PL-09 ER -05 Rev B (Received 26/06/2019), 45MM BOX SASH SET, 57MM BOX SASH SET
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt, and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing building except as otherwise shown on the proposed plans hereby approved under Condition 2.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 7.4 & 7B of the Development Management DPD (2013), policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the Consolidated London Plan (2016) and policies 1.1 (g), 2.1 (c) and 2.10 of the Adopted Core Strategy (2012).
| No part of the roof of the extension shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof garden, roof terrace or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of nearby properties in accordance with policies 7.4 and 7.6 of The London Plan (2016), polices 7.4, 7A & 7B of the Adopted Ealing Development Management Plan Document (2013) and polices 1.1 (e)(g), 1.2 (f), 2.1(c) and 2.10 Adopted Development (Core) Strategy 2012
